amendment.description: To amend title 49, United States Code, to allow the arming of pilots of cargo aircraft.

vote.text: Amendment SA 903 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 903 proposed by Senator Bunning. (consideration: CR S7799-7800; text: CR S7800) To amend title 49, United States Code, to allow the arming of pilots of cargo aircraft.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 903 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 903 proposed by Senator Bunning.
